articles.author: Nic Savage
articles.title: Aussie cricket prodigy’s stunning demolition
articles.description: Australian prodigy Cameron Green has claimed his maiden five-wicket haul in international cricket, achieving the feat against Zimbabwe in the first ODI at Riverway Stadium.
articles.content:
Australian prodigy Cameron Green has claimed his maiden five-wicket haul in international cricket, achieving the feat against Zimbabwe in the first ODI at Riverway Stadium.

articles.author: Jennifer Hiller
articles.title: Disney Gets Deal to Broadcast Cricket Events in India
articles.description: The company has secured a deal to air four years of global cricket events to its subscribers in India, after losing broadcast rights earlier this year for a popular Indian cricket league.
articles.content:
